profile.name: Product Owner
profile.description: Join us to breathe life into meaningful products, and turn our ideas to super functional MVPs. If case studies on a lazy afternoon are your kinda thing, letâ€™s talk!
about: Do you love breaking down a complex project into manageable pieces?
Do you enjoy the process of creating order out of chaos?
Do you like balancing the expectations of the various stakeholders to create a win-win situation for everyone?
Do you enjoy research, creating lists, and knowing a little bit of everything?
Do you frequently do deep dives into why a product or service succeeded or failed?
Do you believe that clear communication and transparency between stakeholders is non-negotiable?
If you have answered yes to most of these questions, we want to talk to you.
tasks: Participate in building prototypes and showcase products.
You are the primary communication channel among the client, tech & design team.
Strong understanding of business problems to propose possible solutions.
Be a proxy customer for the development and design team to improve their efficiency
Help the business team to shape the vision, strategy and roadmap of the product.
requirements: Min. 5 years of experience as a business analyst/product owner.
Demonstrating ownership of the work you've done.
Comfortable in communicating and reaching clarity on ambiguous business requirements by talking with stakeholders.
Ability to work in an agile environment and comfortable with creating good user stories, creating a healthy backlog, story kick-off, UAT testing, etc.
Continuously defines priorities and focuses on maximizing the value of product delivery by liaising with key stakeholders.
Experience in API integration and validating the feature expectation as request-response using tools like Postman.
Experience with 3rd party integrations like Payment Gateways, CRM, CDP, Salesforce etc.
nice_to_have: Participation in startup/business community engagements as a speaker.
Business mindset and understanding of enterprise-level problems.
Already worked on highly growing startups.
Tech coding and feature testing background.
